channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 消息人士称，随着最后期限的临近，橡树资本致力于延长国际米兰的融资方案
item.description: Oaktree Capital Management is working to extend a 275 million euro ($298 million) loan to Italy's top flight soccer club Inter Milan before it expires in May, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.翻译:两位知情人士告诉路透社，橡树资本管理公司正在努力在 5 月份到期之前向意大利顶级足球俱乐部国际米兰提供 2.75 亿欧元（合 2.98 亿美元）的贷款。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 土耳其拘留六名涉嫌为中国监视维吾尔人的人
item.description: Turkish authorities have detained six people suspected of spying on Uyghurs in Turkey for China's intelligence service, and another suspect was being sought by police, state-run Anadolu news agency reported on Tuesday.翻译:据国营阿纳多卢通讯社周二报道，土耳其当局拘留了六名涉嫌为中国情报部门在土耳其监视维吾尔人的人，另一名嫌疑人正在接受警方追捕。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 由于立法推动停滞，美国众议院成立人工智能特别工作组
item.description: Leaders of the U.S. House of Representatives said Tuesday they are forming a bipartisan task force to explore potential legislation to address concerns around artificial intelligence.翻译:美国众议院领导人周二表示，他们正在组建一个两党特别工作组，探索潜在的立法，以解决有关人工智能的担忧。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 澳大利亚作家杨恒均不会上诉在中国的死刑缓期执行 - 家人
item.description: Australian writer Yang Hengjun will not appeal a suspended death sentence in China because the process would delay the possibility of supervised medical care, his family said in a statement on Wednesday.翻译:澳大利亚作家杨恒均的家人周三在一份声明中表示，他不会对中国的死刑缓期判决提出上诉，因为这一过程将延迟接受监督医疗护理的可能性。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 补时阶段贾德森进球，山东队晋级亚冠八强
item.description: Brazilian defender Jadson scored seven minutes into stoppage time to earn Shandong Taishan a 4-2 win over Kawasaki Frontale on Tuesday to take the Chinese side into the quarter-finals of the Asian Champions League with a 6-5 aggregate victory.翻译:周二，巴西后卫贾德森在伤停补时第7分钟打入一球，帮助山东泰山4-2战胜川崎前锋，以总比分6-5晋级亚冠八强。
item.author: Michael Church

item.title: 欧盟贸易主管称中国必须看到改革世贸组织规则的必要性
item.description: China needs to play a constructive role in talks at the World Trade Organization to reform global trade rules on industrial subsidies or risk rivals setting their own policies at China's expense, the European Union's trade chief said on Monday.翻译:欧盟贸易负责人周一表示，中国需要在世界贸易组织的谈判中发挥建设性作用，以改革有关工业补贴的全球贸易规则，否则竞争对手将面临以牺牲中国利益为代价制定自己的政策的风险。
item.author: Philip Blenkinsop

item.title: 英伟达的强劲增长可能仍令一些投资者失望
item.description: Nvidia is set to post a more than three-fold surge in its fourth-quarter revenue on Wednesday, the same as in the previous quarter, as demand for its chips that dominate the market for artificial intelligence outstrips supply.翻译:由于主导人工智能市场的芯片供不应求，英伟达第四季度营收周三将增长三倍以上，与上一季度持平。
item.author: Arsheeya Bajwa

item.title: 高盛表示，对冲基金在降息前加倍押注中国
item.description: Hedge funds favoured Asian emerging markets in the week to Feb. 15, piling into company stocks in China, Korea, Taiwan, and India, in moves that came just before China slashed its benchmark mortgage rate, Goldman Sachs research showed.翻译:高盛的研究显示，截至2月15日当周，对冲基金青睐亚洲新兴市场，纷纷买入中国、韩国、台湾和印度的公司股票，此举发生在中国大幅下调基准抵押贷款利率之前。
item.author: Nell Mackenzie, Summer Zhen

item.title: 早盘竞价：利率焦虑、中国降息和信用卡交易
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 共和党议员敦促拜登停用竞选 TikTok 账户
item.description: A group of 18 Republican lawmakers has urged President Joe Biden to deactivate his campaign's TikTok account citing national security concerns.翻译:由 18 名共和党议员组成的团体以国家安全为由，敦促总统乔·拜登停用其竞选团队的 TikTok 账户。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 独家：日本九州电力将等待美国查尔斯湖液化天然气政策的明确
item.description: Japan's Kyushu Electric Power will wait until after the United States resumes issuing export licences for new liquefied natural gas (LNG) projects before deciding on whether to invest in the Lake Charles project, an executive said.翻译:日本九州电力公司一位高管表示，将等到美国恢复向新的液化天然气（LNG）项目发放出口许可证后，再决定是否投资查尔斯湖项目。
item.author: Yuka Obayashi

item.title: 海外旅游回暖，中国游客涌向东南亚
item.description: Chinese travellers flocked to tourist hot-spots across Asia over the Lunar New Year break, with visitor numbers and spending in destinations including Singapore, Thailand and Malaysia exceeding pre-COVID levels.翻译:农历新年期间，中国游客涌向亚洲各地的旅游热点，新加坡、泰国和马来西亚等目的地的游客人数和消费都超过了新冠疫情前的水平。
item.author: Sophie Yu, Orathai Sriring

item.title: 最高监管机构要求中国金融部门遵循共产党的价值观
item.description: China's top financial watchdogs vowed to keep up a campaign to ensure that the sector adheres to Communist Party values and serves the economy while avoiding "excessive" and "reckless" risks, the party's official newspaper said on Tuesday.翻译:中共官方报纸周二称，中国最高金融监管机构誓言要继续开展行动，确保该行业遵守共产党的价值观并为经济服务，同时避免“过度”和“鲁莽”的风险。
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: 美国资产管理公司已准备好产品迎接中国复苏
item.description: Three straight years of losses from Chinese markets and anti-Beijing rhetoric from Washington have not deterred some U.S. asset managers from introducing products they hope will thrive if Chinese stocks rebound.翻译:中国市场连续三年的下跌以及华盛顿的反北京言论并没有阻止一些美国资产管理公司推出他们希望在中国股市反弹时能够蓬勃发展的产品。
item.author: Suzanne McGee, Megan Davies

item.title: 埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 的 SpaceX 如何因中国火箭故障而在印度尼西亚大放异彩
item.description: When a Chinese rocket malfunctioned shortly after launch in April 2020, destroying Indonesia's $220 million Nusantara-2 satellite, it was a blow to the archipelago's efforts to strengthen its communication networks. But it presented an opportunity for one man.翻译:2020 年 4 月，一枚中国火箭发射后不久出现故障，摧毁了印度尼西亚耗资 2.2 亿美元的 Nusantara-2 卫星，这对该群岛加强通信网络的努力是一个打击。但这为一个人提供了一个机会。
item.author: Stefanno Sulaiman, Devjyot Ghoshal, Joe Brock

item.title: 油价走低，需求担忧抵消了地缘政治价格支撑
item.description: Oil prices settled lower on Tuesday, with worries about global demand offsetting price support from the Israel-Hamas conflict.翻译:由于对全球需求的担忧抵消了以色列与哈马斯冲突对价格的支撑，油价周二走低。
item.author: Laura Sanicola

item.title: 新加坡航展拉开帷幕 中国商飞、波音订单不断
item.description: Singapore on Tuesday kicked off Asia's biggest aviation gathering with orders for China's COMAC and Boeing planes as the industry grapples with a rebound in post-pandemic travel demand in the face of severe supply constraints.翻译:周二，新加坡以中国商飞和波音飞机的订单拉开了亚洲最大的航空盛会的序幕，该行业在面临严重的供应限制的情况下努力应对大流行后旅行需求的反弹。
item.author: Lisa Barrington, Brenda Goh, Joe Brock

item.title: 中国下调抵押贷款参考利率以重振房地产市场
item.description: China announced its biggest ever reduction in the benchmark mortgage rate on Tuesday, as authorities sought to prop up the struggling property market and broader economy.翻译:中国周二宣布有史以来最大幅度的基准抵押贷款利率下调，当局试图支撑陷入困境的房地产市场和更广泛的经济。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国激发全球增长希望，美元下跌，澳元上涨
item.description: The U.S. dollar weakened on Tuesday and the Australian currency gained after China cut interest rates in a bid to prop up its struggling property market, boosting hopes of additional stimulus that would boost global growth.翻译:在中国降息以支撑陷入困境的房地产市场后，美元周二走软，澳元上涨，增加了出台额外刺激措施以促进全球经济增长的希望。
item.author: Karen Brettell

item.title: 外交部长表示中方愿与欧盟共同维护自由贸易和多边主义
item.description: China is ready to work with the European Union to uphold free trade, practice multilateralism, and promote an equal and orderly multi-polar world and inclusive economic globalisation, its foreign minister said during a visit to Spain.翻译:中国外交部长在访问西班牙时表示，中方愿同欧盟一道，维护自由贸易，践行多边主义，推动平等有序的多极化世界和包容性经济全球化。
item.author: Reuters
